name: Mohit Gupta 0001
content: Mohit Gupta â€“ Wision Lab Web Mohit Gupta I am an associate professor of Computer Sciences at the University of Wisconsin-Madison. Before coming to Madison, I was a research scientist in Columbia University. I received my PhD from the Robotics Institute, Carnegie Mellon University. I direct the WISIONLab with research interests broadly in computer vision and computational imaging. CV mohitg@cs.wisc.edu
